value:
I will avenge my father by
destroying Gharnef with my
inheritance, the great tome Aura!

I was once captured by some
ruffians. It was terrifying, but
Prince Marth saved me.

I wanted to thank you. I know
that you've been looking out for
all of us.

Thank you for the kind words
about my outfit, but please don't
make a fuss.

This robe is precious to me.
It was a gift from my late
father.

I think that you must be
$Nu, yes?$k$pI've been sent to say hello by
$Nf.

Today is turning out pretty
nicely!

I'm starting to come into my
true power.

I can't bear the thought of my
father seeing me like this.

It is not enough that I inherited
Aura—I must be worthy of it.

I am Linde, daughter to Pontifex
Miloah. I...also don't like having
everyone look at me.

Excuse me—not to embarrass you
or anything—but I wanted to thank
you.$k$pMuch has happened since we first
met, but I've made a lot of happy
memories with you and the others.$k$pBack where I came from, I had just
lost my father, and I was...so...$k$pSorry. I'm OK now. But I wanted
you to know how grateful I am for
this new life.$k$pThank you for your concern and
your kindness. You are an
inspiration to everyone.
はいっ！
えいっ！
きゃああっ！
I-I won't lose
Divine radiance, heed me!
You're in trouble now.
This is going to hurt.
I won't lose!
Father...
Heehee
Did you need me for something?
Ah! What do you want?
These clothes were a gift from my father. I wear them in his honor.
I'm a little shy with crowds, but I'm not embarrassed by anything I've done.
I'm proud to call myself Miloah's child.
I will avenge my father and bring his killer to justice.
Oh, care for a longer chat?
OK.
What next?
Ready.
